name: Attack
note:
スキル１番は［攻撃］コマンドを
選択したときに使用されます。

name: Defend
note:
スキル２番は［防御］コマンドを
選択したときに使用されます。

description: The basics of healing magic.
name: Heal

description:
Even high-ranking magicians start by learning this attack spell. It's the
fundamental of all magic. The primal magic that distinguishes humans from
beasts.
name: Fire

description:
High-level attack magic. Strictly speaking, it's an attack spell compressed by
the caster's magical power. High-density magic emits strong light and heat,
hence it is called lightning.
name: Spark

description:
A technique of striking hard with the hilt of a weapon. A strong blow can
intimidate the opponent, causing them to hesitate and slow down their actions.
name: Power Hit

description: DMG-50% Stun
name: Hilt Strike

description: Incapacitated. For event confirmation purposes.
name: Incapacitated - Test

description:
Remembering the oath etched in one's heart, one enhances their defensive
abilities.
name: Loyalty's Rampart

description:
The power remains the same, but due to speed adjustments, it allows one to act
preemptively.
message1: quickly approaches the enemy and swings their weapon!
name: Quick Start

description: Focuses mentally and slightly readjusts one's stance.
name: Quick Charge

description:
A flying slash released from a stance. As if representing a knight's loyalty,
the sword strike extends straight and true.
name: Wind Cutter

description: Enemy exclusive
name: Vampiric Drain

description: Enemy exclusive
name: Charge

description: Enemy exclusive
message1: swings their arms wildly with all their might!
name: Rampage

message1: is aiming, ready to pounce at any moment.
name: Gather Strength

message1: is panting and watching over here.
name: Observe (Enemy)

description: Skip turn 0
name: Skip Turn 0

message1: is watching with a frightened look.
name: Observe

message1: is bewildered by the sudden turn of events.
name: Sneak Attack

message2: A heavy blow disrupts the stance!
name: Guard Break

message2: The arrow soaked in poison robs the body of its freedom!
name: Rapid Paralysis Arrow

message1: is bewildered and can't do anything!
name: Bewilder

message1: attacks with a venomous, festering fang!
name: Deadly Poison Attack

message1: became drunk and started swinging at allies!
name: Confusion Attack

message1: 's tentacles burrow deeply into the body, draining stamina!
name: Tentacle - Absorb

message1: 's sword flash was too fast to catch with the eye!
name: Chancellor - Bleeding Attack

message1: prepared a magical barrier on the enemy's territory!
name: Formation of Magic Circle

message1: prepared a tactical barrier on the enemy's front!
name: Formation of Tactical Circle

message2: Began chanting the spell with intense concentration and high speed!
name: Grand Magic Preparation

message2: Began chanting the spell with intense concentration and high speed!
name: Blood Crystal Magic Preparation

message1: is uncontrollably lashing out in anger at everyone around!
name: Lower Command

description: Basic healing magic. It can also remove minor status abnormalities.
name: Heal Plus

description:
Basic treatment magic. It can cure most status abnormalities, but not bleeding
caused by blood crystal magic or powerful curses.
name: Cure

description:
A simple throwing attack that involves grabbing and hurling a stone found on the
ground.
message1: picked up a stone and threw it!
name: Laborer - Stone Throw

description: HP recovery, hemostatic effect.
name: Laborer - First Aid

description: Inspire allies and increase their defense.
message1: inspires each other and stirs up the desire to escape!
name: Laborer - Encourage

description: Perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation. Revive from incapacitation.
name: Laborer - CPR

message1: threatened the worker they had brought along!
message2: "You understand what will happen if we let these guys escape, right?!"
name: Guard - Intimidate

message2: "Do you rats even realize who you're defying?"
name: Guard - Oppression

message1: is watching with a frightened look.
name: Laborer - Observe

message1: picked up a stone and threw it!
name: Laborer - Stone Throw

message1: 's legs are giving out, and it looks like he's about to run away!
name: Laborer - Intimidate

message1: inspires allies and boosts their will to fight!
name: Laborer - Inspire

description:
Throws fine sand grains to blind the enemy. It's effective when used
unexpectedly and can also silence a noisy opponent with a wide-open mouth.
message1: scatters fine dust around the area!
name: Laborer - Kick Up Dust

description: A powerful striking attack launched from a deep crouch. It may miss at times.
message1: lowered his hips deeply and thrust straight into his opponent!
name: Laborer - Straight Punch

description:
A sharp gust of wind released from a sword clad in wind. Sweeps across all
enemies.
name: Sonic Penetration

description:
Uses the magical power residing in the sword to recover a small amount of
health.
name: Heel Breeze

description: Quickly tends to wounds, capable of curing poison status as well.
name: First Aid

description: Swings the weapon with brute force. High power, but often misses.
message1: swung their weapon with all their might!
name: Slam

description:
Swings the weapon with brute force. Can attack a wide range, but also prone to
missing.
message1: swung their weapon with all their might!
name: Swing Around

description: Inspires oneself and allies in battle, raising fighting spirit.
name: Flower Blooming Underground

description:
A testament to never forgetting the knight's heart even in the dimmest gloom.
Swings the weapon with brute force. Swings the weapon with brute force. Indeed,
helping others should always be this way.
message1: swung the weapon with all his might!
name: Twilight Excavation Knight

description:
Creates an impromptu blade of magical ice for attacking. Even with just a branch
or bare hands, a knight can expect a certain level of slashing ability—truly a
knight's ace in the hole.
name: Icicle Slash

description:
A full-body technique that cuts through enemies like a whirlwind with each step.
This should be sufficient for ordinary opponents.
message1: cuts through the enemies like a swift wind!
name: Shred

description: A sweet, woman-friendly cocktail with a mild alcohol content.
name: Cocktail for Women

description:
A spicy woman-friendly cocktail with a strong aftertaste and higher alcohol
content.
name: Premium Cocktail for Women

description:
A dry man-friendly cocktail with a soft mouthfeel and pleasant fruit aroma.
Average alcohol content.
name: Cocktail for Men

description:
A mild-tasting large-sized man-friendly cocktail. If you want to show off your
manliness, this is the one.
name: Premium Cocktail for Men

description:
A cocktail with intense alcohol strength hidden within its sweetness. Named for
its striking appearance, which separates into yellow and black within the glass.
name: Strong Tiger

description:
A cocktail characterized by the spiciness of spices and intense alcohol
strength. The name comes from an anecdote about a customer who breathed fire
from his mouth after just one sip.
name: Strong Dragon

description:
The signature drink of the bar named after twilight. Its deep flavor is like a
setting sun, and the price will bring tears to your eyes afterward.
name: Twilight Tears

description:
Rough on the throat, simple grain aroma, best enjoyed carelessly at room
temperature—such is this drink. It's the warriors' choice for celebrating
victory, and Reisha holds special sentiments for it.
name: Lake Ale

message1: Oh no! It seems the customer is angry!
name: Customer: Reorder

description:
Enhances sustained combat capability. The gentle breeze that swayed the knight's
long hair on that day is both a tender memory for a girl who couldn't choose her
own way of life and a vow held in the heart of a knight who stood with her.
name: Wind Blowing to You

description:
A magical technique that creates an impromptu double-edged blade for consecutive
attacks. A handy skill that even those not adept at magic can use as an
extension of physical techniques. Also highly efficient at recharging energy.
name: Icicle Slash Plus

message1: The magic crystal embedded in  resonates!
name: Magic Ore Crystal Resonance

description: Enemy exclusive, prison officer
name: Bleeding Whip

description:
Activates physical enhancement by channeling magical power into the crystal on
the weapon. The effect is very high, but there's a low chance of physical
abnormality and a medium chance of going berserk.
name: Crystal Resonance

description:
A quick two-stage attack that strikes again after swinging down. A basic one-
handed sword technique that requires good judgment from the user due to
potential openings.
name: Double Slash

description: A rough striking technique that relies on brute strength.
name: Armor Breaker

description:
A leg sweep followed by a palm strike that also slightly increases evasion and
prepares for counterattack. However, if it doesn't take the initiative, it's
merely a strong attack. Learn from the villainous ways, but always keep a noble
heart.
name: Outlaw Strike

description:
A series of flowing continuous punches unleashed by Reisha. The large swings
that deliberately disrupt refined movements are an expression of enjoying the
brawl.
name: Continuous Beating

description:
The evening tavern teaches knights about human strength. A drunken patron
reaches out to a swaying butt, only to have his hand deftly twisted away. "Hey
hey, this kind of thing troubles me. Well, next time be more skillful so you
don't get caught!"
name: Dusk Town's Number One Rabbit

description:
Strengthens the sword with wind attributes and kicks up the surrounding ground
to strike at the enemy. This rough technique relies on the sturdiness of the
weapon and is an embodiment of fury itself.
name: Rage

message1: swung their arm like a hammer!
name: Golem - Continuous Attack

message1: The Golem's magic engine starts up!!
name: Magical Engine Activation

description:
A quick leap followed by an upward spinning kick. The strong impact can make the
opponent flinch and slow down their actions.
name: Flying Back Spin Kick

description:
A swift three-hit combo with a weapon. Even basic sword techniques can become
secret moves with enough polish. If once doesn't work, strike twice; if twice
fails, then thrice. It is a gift of perseverance.
name: Triple Slash

description: Mix a small amount of gunpowder for explosives. Can be stacked up to [x3] times.
name: Gunpowder Mixing

description:
Detonate the mixed gunpowder in a grand explosion. The power increases with the
amount of gunpowder mixed.
name: Akane Grenade

description:
Stab the opponent with a specially processed blade filled with poison. It may
lack a finishing blow, but if one focuses on evasion afterward, the enemy will
eventually fall—a technique suitable for thieves.
message1: brandishes a blade laced with poison!
name: Poison Knife

description:
Stab the opponent with a specially processed blade filled with paralyzing agent.
Used with the purpose of robbing the enemy of their freedom.
message1: brandishes a blade laced with paralyzing poison!
name: Paralysis Knife

description:
Stab the opponent with a specially processed blade further equipped with a
twisted edge. The numerous lacerations won't close for a while.
name: Bleeding Knife

description:
Concentrate all nerves on evading attacks. All attacks except for guaranteed
hits can be avoided. Also comes with a bonus of gunpowder mixing [x3].
message2: I'm better at this than fighting! Shall we get to it?
name: Thief's Ultimate Technique

description:
Step forward to protect allies and take attacks. Also has a slight damage
reduction effect.
message1: stepped in front of his allies!
name: Protect

description:
Absorb the surrounding magical power and release the magic stored in the blade
along with a slash. In exchange for the wielder's vitality, it unleashes a
waterfall-like grand technique that overwhelms the enemy with powerful status
ailments that corrode their body.
name: Silent Blade

description:
The highest skill that uses the magic within the sword to recover vitality. Also
removes debuffs in a defensive state.
name: Heal Breeze Plus All

description: The basic magic of resurrection.
name: Resurrection

description: The basic magic of resurrection.
name: Resurrection

description:
Summon countless mindless tentacles to restrain the enemy. A certain level of
impact damage can also be expected.
name: Summon - Tentacles

description:
Create a holy sword and bestow it upon an ally. Enhances the body and improves
attack capabilities. The magic that sacrifices blood also wounds the user.
Inflicts [Bleeding] on the caster.
name: Blood Crystal Magic - Sword Creation

description:
Create the hilt of the holy sword to protect allies. It recovers vitality and
enhances defensive capabilities. The magic that sacrifices blood also wounds the
user. [Bleeding+1] is applied to the user.
name: Blood Crystal Magic - Handle Creation

description:
Create the scabbard of the holy sword to bestow protection. It enhances the
ability to continue fighting and breaks even strong curses. The magic that
sacrifices blood also wounds the user. [Bleeding+2] is applied to the user.
name: Blood Crystal Magic - Sheath Creation

description:
Create a holy spear that pierces all things to annihilate enemies. The magic
that sacrifices blood also wounds the user. [Bleeding+1] is applied to the user.
name: Blood Crystal Magic - Spear Creation

description:
Create the holy sword from the royal bloodline. Its radiance is said to lead the
nation to dawn, a treasure of the highest order of the royal family. Though it
was said to be lost in chaos, now it lies within your grasp──. [Bleeding+3] is
applied to the user.
message1: 's creation of the holy sword. It dispels all darkness!
name: Blood Crystal Magic - Sword of Dawn

description:
An advanced skill that uses the magical power residing in the sword to recover
vitality.
name: Heal Breeze Plus

description:
Even amidst battle, her graceful figure does not falter, leading the knight to
greater heights. It enhances the user's spirit and vitality.
message1: maintains dignity and grace even in the midst of battle!
name: Imposing Presence

description:
A flying slash released from a stance. The glowing sword strike, representing
the knight's loyalty, extends straight ahead.
name: True Wind Cutter

description: A sharp gale released from a blade clad in light. It sweeps across all enemies.
name: True Sonic Penetration

description:
A holy strike unleashed by the knight. Its brilliance is said to lead the nation
to dawn, a treasure of the highest order of the royal family. Much has been
gained and lost. At the end of her journey, now it lies within her grasp──.
name: Treasured Sword: Sword of Akatsuki

message2: "Do you understand the feeling of being able to do nothing but watch the king you believed in grow weaker?"
name: Full Moon

message2: "Be crushed. To the point where you can never stand on those legs again."
name: Hellgate

message2: Countless tentacles stretching from the pool of blood implant the seeds of a curse into the body!
name: Gift: Curse

description:
A high-level attack magic. Strictly speaking, it's an attack spell that has been
powerfully compressed by the caster's magical power. The high-density magic
emits strong light and heat, hence it is called lightning.
name: Blizzard

description:
A high-level attack magic. Strictly speaking, it's an attack spell that has been
powerfully compressed by the caster's magical power. The high-density magic
emits strong light and heat, hence it is called lightning.
name: Spark

message1: releases an intense impulse from within and explodes!
name: Self-Destruct

message1: delivered a crushing blow that shattered bones!
name: Bone Crusher

message1: 's armor was shattered by a powerful strike!
name: Armor Crusher

message1: swept the opponent's legs with a long weapon!
name: Sweeping Slash

message1: unleashes a diving uppercut followed by a spinning kick!
name: Roundhouse Kick

message1: 's body is being corroded by the poison of magical power!
name: Magic Intoxication: Poison

message1: 's body is being corroded by the poison of magical power!
name: Magic Intoxication: Paralysis

message1: The magic crystal embedded in  resonates!
name: Magic Resonance

message1: delivered a fierce strike that tore through the skin!
name: Bleeding Drill

message1: rapidly re-cooled the engine with magical power!
name: Magic Engine: Reboot

message1: is looking this way with a vulgar smile for no apparent reason.
name: Giggling Madly

message1: picked up a stone and threw it!
name: Stone Throw

description: Enemy Exclusive
message1: grappled with the opponent and licked their skin all over!
name: Caress the Skin

description:
A special throwing knife used by hitmen. It can be expected to have a certain
effect regardless of the wielder's skill.
name: Shattering Kunai

description:
A special throwing knife used by hitmen. It can be expected to have a certain
effect regardless of the wielder's skill.
name: Shadow Stitching Kunai

message1: is intimidated and can't move properly!
name: Wither

message1: releases a tremendous amount of magical power and revives the tentacles!
name: Resurrection

description: Revives an ally from incapacitation with a stern pep talk.
message2: "This is no place to be passed out! Wake up!"
name: Focus Energy

description:
A torrent of magical power released from the artificial magic sword. It turns
the battlefield into nothing but a pool of red blood.
name: Chaotic Full Moon

description:
A torrent of magical power released from the artificial magic sword. That door
leads one's body to madness.
name: Chaotic Hellgate
